questions.question: So our sense of right and wrong, what does that mean compared to a squirrel's sense of right and wrong?
Do you think they're more likely to be friendly, to befriend us or to destroy us?
Because in the future, people will say, who wants to see a screen with images?
Do you think, as you mentioned, entertainment, but what kind of effect would it have on our personal relationships?
You know, in the zoo, did you know that we sometimes have zookeepers that imitate animals?
You go home, you solve it, or you ask your mom, why couldn't he solve it?
So why should an advanced civilization go through all that effort just to simulate a Saturday night live?
